metadata.synopsis: Combat AD for Ettvard Needle if you choose to attack him and his Steel Watchers inside the Baldurs Mouth Building
metadata.how_to_trigger: Either Choose the Attack option from the dialog with Ettvard Needle or start a combat with the Steel Watchers in the Baldurs Mouth building

0.speaker: Ettvard Needle
0.text: Watchers! The city's free speech is under threat - do your duty!

1.speaker: Ettvard Needle
1.text: Oh, you've just earned yourself a scathing obituary.
